core_values.title: Automated Contextual Tagging
core_values.description: AI analyzes visual content, color palettes, and stylistic elements to create searchable metadata instantly.

core_values.title: Natural Language Semantic Search
core_values.description: Find files using descriptions like 'that moody blue landscape from the summer project' instead of keywords.
core_values.benefit: Intuitive retrieval that matches how creators think.

core_values.title: Smart Version Control
core_values.description: Visual diffing and automatic version stacking for creative files (PSD, AI, BLEND).
core_values.benefit: Prevents data loss and simplifies client revision tracking.

core_values.title: Automated License & Usage Tracking
core_values.description: Tracks where assets are used and their licensing status (stock photos, fonts, etc.).
core_values.benefit: Reduces legal risk and simplifies project handovers.

competitive_advantage: Unlike generic cloud storage (Dropbox/Drive), we provide deep creative-context awareness specifically tuned for high-fidelity media and artistic workflows.
